title: Bayer Products for Pain, Headache, and Fever
author: Beth Johnston, PharmD, BCPS

sections.heading: What do Bayer products treat?
content: Bayer products are used to treat certain types of pain and help lower fever. The types of pain a Bayer product may help with include muscle pain, backache, minor arthritis pain, toothache, headache, and menstrual cramps. The main active ingredient in Bayer products is aspirin, which is a nonsteroidal anti-inflammatory drug ( NSAID ). Aspirin helps relieve fever and pain by blocking certain proteins in your body. Some Bayer products also have caffeine in them to help improve pain relief.
There are Bayer products for adults and children as young as 12 years old.

sections.heading: What are the possible side effects of Bayer products?
content: Side effects may vary depending on the ingredients in the specific product you are using. Some possible side effects of Bayer products include nausea or an upset stomach. If either of these happen to you, try taking the medicine with food.
Since Bayer products may contain more than one ingredient (listed below), review the ingredients in your specific product to understand which side effects you might experience.

Stop using the medicine if you develop a rash or hives. Get medical help right away if you have signs of a serious allergic reaction, such as trouble breathing or swelling of the face, lips, or throat.

sections.heading: What should I know before using Bayer products?
content: Aspirin use by certain people may cause a serious condition called Reye’s syndrome . Children or teenagers who have or are recovering from either chickenpox or flu-like symptoms should not take aspirin. Call a health care provider right away if a child or teenager has nausea and vomiting with behavior changes. These could be symptoms of Reye’s syndrome.

Aspirin Risk. Aspirin can increase the risk of stomach bleeding. Talk to a health care provider before taking a Bayer product if you have stomach problems, heartburn, high blood pressure, heart disease, liver or kidney problems, bleeding problems, or asthma, or you take blood thinners, steroids, a water pill (diuretic), or other NSAIDs. Also, check with them if you drink three or more alcoholic drinks per day or are aged 60 or older.

sections.heading: Caffeine.
content: Taking other caffeine-containing medicines or drinking things with caffeine in them, such as coffee, soda, or tea, while using a Bayer product that has caffeine in it can cause nervousness, a fast heartbeat, and irritability.

content_blocks.text: Taking other caffeine-containing medicines or drinking things with caffeine in them, such as coffee, soda, or tea, while using a Bayer product that has caffeine in it can cause nervousness, a fast heartbeat, and irritability.

content: Some Bayer products may contain phenylalanine. If you have phenylketonuria , do not take a Bayer product that contains phenylalanine. Carefully read the label of any Bayer product before you take it.
If you are pregnant, do not take any Bayer product without first talking with your health care provider. Aspirin may cause problems in a fetus. Problems during delivery may also happen.
Stop taking a Bayer product and call your doctor right away if you have any of the following serious side effects.

There may be side effects, additional warnings, and interactions with other medicines that are not listed here. These may vary depending on the combination of ingredients in the specific Bayer product you are using. Always check the label before taking any over-the-counter medicine. Do not take more than the recommended dose. Talk to your doctor or pharmacist about your health conditions and other medicines to help determine which products are safe for you.
bullets: Stomach pain that doesn’t go away
Pain that gets worse or lasts more than 10 days or you have new symptoms such as redness or swelling
Ringing in your ears or trouble hearing
Fever gets worse or lasts for more than three days

sections.heading: Which Bayer product is right for me?
content: Bayer products for pain, headache, or fever contain at least 325 mg of aspirin. Both tablets and caplets need to be swallowed. Both tablets and caplets are coated, so they may be easier to swallow. If you cannot swallow a tablet or caplet, you may consider a powder that you pour onto your tongue and let dissolve. Then, drink a full glass of water.
Genuine Bayer Aspirin
Bayer Extra Strength
Aspirina
Aspirin Cafeina
Bayer Back and Body
Bayer Rapid Relief Packs
bullets: Caplet containing aspirin 500 mg and caffeine 32.5 mg
Caplet containing aspirin 500 mg and caffeine 32.5 mg
Powder pack containing aspirin 650 mg and caffeine 65 mg
